definition: to be drenched with blood/dripping blood

sentences.english: But his eyes were also bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 眼中卻是一片鮮血淋漓。

sentences.english: And made the big black bear bleed blood.
sentences.chinese: 並把大黑熊咬得鮮血淋漓。

sentences.english: And they could have daily mock stabbings and fake blood.
sentences.chinese: 然後這些吉祥物每天都可以模擬被鮮血淋漓地刺死。

sentences.english: It was my bloody thorn cusp , black and blue.
sentences.chinese: 它的尖角刺得我鮮血淋漓，遍體鱗傷。

sentences.english: They had won, but they were weary and bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 他們勝利了，但他們都已是疲憊不堪，鮮血淋漓。
